metadata.title: SCIENCE CHINA Chemistry Improved synthesis of rupintrivir

abstract.original_text: An improved synthesis of rupintrivir (AG7088) was accomplished using three amino acids (L-glutamic acid, D-4-fluorophenylalanine, and L-valine) as the building blocks. The key fragment ketomethylene dipeptide isostere was constructed with the valine derivative and phenylpropionic acid derivative, followed by coupling with a lactam derivative and an isoxazole acid chloride to provide AG7088 totally in eight steps.

sentences.segment_text: An improved synthesis of rupintrivir ( AG7088 ) was accomplished using three amino acids ( L-glutamic acid , D-4-fluorophenylalanine , and L-valine ) as the building blocks .
The key fragment ketomethylene dipeptide isostere was constructed with the valine derivative and phenylpropionic acid derivative ,
followed by coupling with a lactam derivative and an isoxazole acid chloride to provide AG7088 totally in eight steps .
